bouncierbeds-fabric.duskconfig.title: Bouncier Beds Config
bouncierbeds-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_beds: Whether beds should prevent fall damage when a player lands on them. It's recommended to keep this enabled if you have lots of bounciness.
bouncierbeds-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_bedB: The modifier of how much a bed bounces. A value of 2.0 makes the player jump around 30 blocks. A value of 100.0 makes the player jump around 4500 blocks.
